extracted_playbook.title: Require Multi-Factor Authentication
extracted_playbook.description: Require multi-factor authentication for remote access to OT and IT networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Enable Strong Spam Filters
extracted_playbook.description: Enable strong spam filters to prevent phishing emails from reaching end users and filter emails containing executable files.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement User Training Program
extracted_playbook.description: Implement a user training program and simulated attacks for spearphishing to discourage users from visiting malicious websites or opening malicious attachments.

extracted_playbook.title: Filter Network Traffic
extracted_playbook.description: Filter network traffic to prohibit ingress and egress communications with known malicious IP addresses and prevent users from accessing malicious websites by implementing URL blocklists and/or allowlists.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Software and Firmware
extracted_playbook.description: Update software, including operating systems, applications, and firmware on IT network assets, in a timely manner. Consider using a centralized patch management system.

extracted_playbook.title: Limit Network Access
extracted_playbook.description: Limit access to resources over networks, especially by restricting RDP. If RDP is necessary, restrict the originating sources and require multi-factor authentication.

extracted_playbook.title: Set Antivirus/Antimalware Programs
extracted_playbook.description: Set antivirus/antimalware programs to conduct regular scans of IT network assets using up-to-date signatures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Unauthorized Execution Prevention
extracted_playbook.description: Disable macro scripts from Microsoft Office files transmitted via email and consider using Office Viewer software. Implement application allowlisting and software restriction policies to prevent unauthorized execution.

extracted_playbook.title: Monitor and Block Inbound Connections
extracted_playbook.description: Monitor and/or block inbound connections from Tor exit nodes and other anonymization services. Deploy signatures to detect and/or block inbound connections from Cobalt Strike servers and other post-exploitation tools.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Network Segmentation
extracted_playbook.description: Implement robust network segmentation between IT and OT networks to limit adversaries' ability to pivot to the OT network. Define a demilitarized zone and organize OT assets into logical zones.

extracted_playbook.title: Identify Network Inter-dependencies
extracted_playbook.description: Identify OT and IT network inter-dependencies and develop workarounds or manual controls to ensure ICS networks can be isolated if necessary.

extracted_playbook.title: Test Contingency Plans
extracted_playbook.description: Regularly test contingency plans such as manual controls to ensure safety-critical functions can be maintained during a cyber incident.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Regular Data Backup Procedures
extracted_playbook.description: Implement regular data backup procedures on both IT and OT networks. Ensure backups are regularly tested, stored separately, and maintained offline.

extracted_playbook.title: Maintain Gold Images and Backup Hardware
extracted_playbook.description: Maintain regularly updated 'gold images' of critical systems and retain backup hardware to rebuild systems if necessary.

extracted_playbook.title: Isolate Infected Systems
extracted_playbook.description: Isolate the infected system by removing it from all networks and disabling networking capabilities. Ensure all shared and networked drives are disconnected.

extracted_playbook.title: Secure Backups
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that backup data is offline and secure. Scan backup data with an antivirus program to check for malware.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Ransomware Incidents
extracted_playbook.description: Report ransomware incidents to your local FBI field office and consider using CISA's no-cost cyber hygiene services to assess and reduce exposure to threats.
